page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: A host of smaller rubber & plastic industries have sprung up in Ross due to successful high technology. Haigh (120) Woodville(475) Wolf Tools(60) Trenwith(38) Wye Valley Precision(25) Quebb(20) Gerald Stains(50) ABT Prod- ucts(20) Permaglaze(20) have all been established since 1948. The tourist industry is represented in Ross by PGL & TOPS - combined offered over 65,000 youngsters adventure holidays in 1984. Farmplan Computer Systems Ltd.(50) man ufactures computer software for farm- ers - the largest in the country.SHACS manufacture animal meal & occupy 12 acres of the area.JB Kemp (28) largest builders merchant in area.Littlewoods (19) depot supplying food to chainsto- res. NB(EMPLOYEES MAY l985).3 stone masons for renovation of buildings in the area use local Forest of Dean sto- ne - also used for grave headstones.
